message: 1、适配Android 10以上版本的分区存储机制（更新后，卡片备份和还原需要手动执行，另外少部分Android 11系统需要重新选择自定义卡片背景，如果之前设置了）||2、适配一加氢和氧系统息屏刷卡功能||3、适配MIUI息屏刷卡功能||4、TargetSdk升级到30 (Android 11)||5、适配部分不支持的系统||6、优化LSPosed的模块默认作用域设置||7、完善帮助文档，遇到问题，请先看帮助文档||8、移除AndroidManifest.xml不必要的配置
message_en: 1. Adapt to the scoped storage mechanism of Android 10 and above (after the update, card backup and restore need to be performed manually, and a small number of Android 11 systems need to re-select the custom card background, if it has been previously set)||2. Adapt to enable nfc function when screen is off of the Hydrogenation and Oxygen system of OnePlus||3. Adapt to enable nfc function when screen is off of the MIUI system.||4. Upgrade TargetSdk to 30 (Android 11)||5. Adapt some other systems of not support before||6. Optimize the default scope setting of LSPosed's module||7. Improve help documentation, if you encounter any problems, please read the help document first||8. Remove unnecessary configuration in AndroidManifest.xml
